job.title: Data Scientist - $200K to $300K Basic Salary + Bonus
job.description: pstrongBase Salary 200k to 300k  Formulaic PayoutstrongppbrppMultistrategy hedge fund is looking for an experienced PhD quantitative researcher to join its quantitative trading teamppbrppYour core focus will be to perform advanced quantitative research to enhance existing and create new and profitable systematic trading strategiesppbrppstrongSkills amp Experiencestrongppbrppgt A PhD in a quantitative discipline from a leading schoolppgt Research expertise in one or more of econometrics statistics math machine learning etcppgt 3  10 years of experience in researching and building profitable systematic trading models amp strategiesppgt Crossasset class experience is welcome but not required  ppgt Self supporting programming skills in Pythonppgt A profitable trading track record is welcome but not requiredppbrppstronguPlease apply via this postingustrongppbrppstrongPlease Note We are a niche recruitment firm specializing in the quantitative trading and Fintech Industry We have been retained by our client to identify interview and introduce suitable candidates for this positionnbspnbspnbspstrongp
